name: Athletic Fields, Commercial Sports, Professional Sports Clubs, Sports
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that operate and promote semiprofessional and
professional athletic clubs (such as baseball, basketball, football,
hockey, and soccer), promote amateur and professional athletic
events, and manage individual athletes. Sports arenas and stadiums
are also included.
